https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5Grpzh0jRp7YbJRSb8Oe0JF9Pq9.jpg Coincidence brings Gyohwan, a ´keyboard warrior´ who has left home and is moving from gosiwon to gosiwon, and Jeongsu, a ´patriotic senior citizen´ who has fought all his life against the left wing, together who become close like a grandfather and grandson. A black comedy about the two who each prepare for their last big event which leads to disaster. Beaten Black And Blue
